entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story. He is being praised by Hermione for finding out how to get back safely.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who is praising him for his accomplishment.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: A house-elf who was mentioned by Harry, but he didn't get a chance to tell Hermione about it because Karkaroff was watching him.

entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: One of the judges who is not showing signs of pleasure and relief that Harry, Ron, and Fleur's sister got back safely. He is watching Harry.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who, along with his sister Fleur, got back safely.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is Ron's sister. She and her brother got back safely.

relationships.description: Hermione praises Harry for finding out how to get back safely. ("Harry, well done! You did it, you found out how all by yourself!")
Harry mentions Dobby in his conversation with Hermione. ("He would have told her about Dobby, but he had just noticed Karkaroff watching him.")
Karkaroff is watching Harry. ("He was the only judge who had not left the table; the only judge not showing signs of pleasure and relief that Harry, Ron, and Fleur's sister had got back safely.")
Harry, along with Ron and Fleur's sister, got back safely. ("the only judge not showing signs of pleasure and relief that Harry, Ron, and Fleur's sister had got back safely.")
Harry, along with Ron and Fleur's sister, got back safely. ("the only judge not showing signs of pleasure and relief that Harry, Ron, and Fleur's sister had got back safely.")
